text: Mrs. G. Goes to College is an American sitcom that ran for 26 episodes on CBS in 1961 to 1962. It stars Gertrude Berg, Cedric Hardwicke, Mary Wickles, Marion Ross, Aneta Corsaut, Karyn Kupcinet and was nominated for 2 Emmys in 1962. ==Other websites== * Category:1961 television series debuts Category:1962 television series endings Category:1960s American comedy television series Category:CBS network shows
title: Mrs. G. Goes to College
